amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 7 of the bill which extends to 2032 provisions in law requiring bilingual ballots under certain circumstances, and to strike section 8 of the bill concerning the use of American Community Survey census data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-554 which seeks to strike sections 7 and 8 from the bill. Sections 7 and 8 relate to multilingual ballots and use of American Community Survey census data, and they would automatically expire in 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 238 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 238 (Roll no. 372).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
